features.title: File ITR using Tax2Win
features.sub_title: Easiest Way of e-filing your Income Tax Return in India
features.description: Use ZingID app to file ITR in collaboration with Tax2Win for smoothest and easiest tax filing in India

features.title: Face Attendance continuous mode
features.sub_title: Real time attendance by continuous face scanning
features.description: Register your face, register your subordinates face attendance, take attendance and approve face registration IDs from your on login.

features.title: Digital ID
features.description: Now Digital ID have continuous scanning with 4 second timer

features.title: OKR
features.sub_title: Digital way of Goals-setting and Tracking with Outcomes
features.description: Objectives and key results is a goal-setting framework for defining and tracking objectives and their outcomes.

features.title: Leave cancellation
features.sub_title: Now applied leave can be cancel from mobile app
features.description: Users can cancel applied leaves from mobile also and can cancel approved as well and approver flow will run as per configuration.

features.title: E-PMS Evaluation and with promotion recommendation
features.sub_title: Promotion recommendation now part of evaluation
features.description: Now manager and reviewer can give recommendation for promotion of employee while doing goals evaluation

features.title: Pin Menu
features.sub_title: Arrange menu according to your need
features.description: Now you can arrange menu, pin them and sort them according to your need. This will auto sync across all your devices.
